name: Target Practice (LumpyStudios)
description:
Welcome to Target Practice. Here you have to shoot down targets and get a great score in about 60 seconds. every time you shoot a target you get an extra 1 second so go fast! :)

To start the game pick up the rifle, load it, and fire at the green block.

The game has more updates than the video shows. its more fun now :)
I will be adding sound affects soon.

Only works with Oculus at the moment. You need Oculus software and Steam VR installed to play.

Hope you enjoy!
